title: AAFC partners up with Evologic on commercialisation of biological glyphosate replacement
content: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) has developed the Phoma macrostoma technology as a biological alternative to conventional herbicide use. In 2020, AAFC invited potential industry partners by a Request for Proposals to commercialize this technology. Evologic Technologies submitted a proposal based on their proposed proprietary and highly innovative production technology, which features a promising opportunity for large scale market introduction of the biological herbicide. Evologic Technologies is pleased to announce that its proposal was successful. To date, Evologic and AAFC are discussing the details of transfer of the Phoma macrostoma technology.
